title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

1 point - for identifying the comparison, which may be expressed in the translation itself, Dido compared to the light, life.

1 point - for citing the appropriate Latin and giving an accurate translation. The minimal amount of Latin for the citation: luce magis. The translation of magis must appear in the answer.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point - for identifying the comparison, which may be expressed in the translation itself, Dido compared to the light, life.

1 point - for citing the appropriate Latin and giving an accurate translation. The minimal amount of Latin for the citation: luce magis. The translation of magis must appear in the answer.

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point - for identifying the comparison, which may be expressed in the translation itself, Dido compared to the light, life.

1 point - for citing the appropriate Latin and giving an accurate translation. The minimal amount of Latin for the citation: luce magis. The translation of magis must appear in the answer.

Student response earns two of the available points.

1 point - for citing the appropriate Latin and giving an accurate translation. The minimal amount of Latin for the citation: luce magis. The translation of magis must appear in the answer.
